short_summary: Modification to closing time for the supply of items and services.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuy posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 9, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST. All bids submitted after May 9, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3781042009 dated March 27, 2023 with a closing of May 2, 2023 at 12:00. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerees/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. The purpose of this Statement of Requirement is to describe the requirements and work effort required from the Contractor by the Department of National Defence for the supply of items and services to meet the requirements for the acquisition and support of the Joint Task Force North Fitness Equipment.
full_summary:
---

**Government Tender Announcement**
**W1568-230005(2) - Fitness Equipment**

**Reference Number:** WP1627793107

**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2023-04-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-09T14:00:00EST

**Procurement Details**
========================

This tender announcement is a request for proposal (RFP) seeking bids for the supply and support of fitness equipment for the Joint Task Force North, a departmental asset of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**
-------------------

*   Department of National Defence (DND)
*   Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Corrected Tender Description**
------------------------------

The previous tender solicitation, Doc3781042009, dated March 27, 2023, with a closing date of May 2, 2023, at 12:00 pm EST, has been cancelled and superseded by this solicitation. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 9, 2023, at 14:00 pm EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

The purpose of this solicitation is to acquire and support fitness equipment for the Joint Task Force North. The Corporation is interested in obtaining information from suppliers regarding their capacity to supply the required items and services.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Please note that the closing time of the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time has been modified to 2:00 pm EST. All documentation and bid submission are required to be made on time.

Contact information:
Name: Nkechi Onwuamamu Ezechinedu
Email: nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
